name: Serena's Adventure
description:
Serena's Adventure is a turn-based strategy game, that seeks, using procedurally generated levels, always to bring new experiences to it's players. 

The game is set right after the kidnapping of Serena's child. by a demon called Bob. And in order to rescue him, she must enter the dungeon controlled by the demon and his minions.

Every special ability is represented by cards, since a deck of enchanted cards is the only weapon Serena carries.

 The deeper she goes into the dungeon, the harder it is to move on. 

The turn system is different than most turn-based games, since the turn order changes depending on the amount of cards used.

The player can even set his own deck before going into an adventure. With that it's possible to set up different strategies to beat the levels.

Defeating enemies will allow you to get more cards in your deck, since they drop a card that goes instantly to your deck. That can help you in your journey.

And if your HP Bar is set to 0, the game is reset, and you will have to start from the first room.
